Html:
First of all pardon my lousy english... i'm trying my best.
I have a very weird problem with PHPExcel library.
I have a version of this program already working on one server... i move it to another server and it stoped working after the include part, it does absolutely nothing... in other words... just goes blank.
i've added:

error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', '1');

at the very top of the script to get some feedback and the only thing I received was this:

Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[PHPExcel/IOFactory.php] in <mi server url>/viewer_analizados.php on line 84
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Autoloader.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/IOFactory.php on line 35
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Shared/ZipStreamWrapper.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Shared/String.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[ExcelFilter.php] in <mi server url>/viewer_analizados.php on line 85
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Reader/IReadFilter.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/CachedObjectStorageFactory.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Settings.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Reader/IReader.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Reader/DefaultReadFilter.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Notice: require(): 1. h->opened_path=[null]  h->filename=[<mi server url>/PHPExcel/../PHPExcel/Shared/OLERead.php] in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Autoloader.php on line 57
Fatal error: Call to undefined method PHPExcel_Shared_OLERead::getStream() in <mi server url>/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 950

I wanted to know if you could give me some support about this, because Googled failed me big time with some useless search-responses
